In England, in the seven days to 16 March, there were 441,094 new confirmed cases (780.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 09 March, there were 284,834 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 55% (156,260 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 21 March is 17,117,061 (30,268.8 cases per 100,000 population).
